webDevelopment.title: Custom Website Development
webDevelopment.description: Websites that turn visitors into customers.

meta.title: Custom Website Development | Modern Websites - Rise.sk
meta.description: Professional custom website development. Fast, secure, and SEO-optimized websites for businesses. Get a quote for a new website today.

webDevelopment.featuresTitle: Why choose us for web development?

features.title: SEO Optimization
features.description: We build websites that Google loves. Proper structure, speed, and metadata are the foundation.

features.title: Extreme Speed
features.description: We use Next.js and modern technologies for lightning-fast loading that increases conversions.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Your website will look perfect on mobile, tablet, and large monitors.

features.title: Cheap and Reliable Hosting
features.description: We provide fast and secure hosting at unbeatable prices. We guarantee 99.9% uptime and regular backups so your website is always online.

features.title: Security
features.description: SSL certificate, protection against attacks, and regular backups are standard with us.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Google Analytics 4 implementation and conversion tracking setup included.

tools.title: Best Tools
tools.subtitle: We use cutting-edge technologies for best results

process.title: Consultation and Analysis
process.description: We identify your goals, target audience, and competition. We propose a strategy.

process.title: Design and Prototype
process.description: We create a visual design (UI/UX) that you approve before coding begins.

process.title: Development and Content
process.description: We program the website, deploy texts, and optimize images.

process.title: Testing and Launch
process.description: We test functionality, speed, and launch the website on your domain.

faq.question: How much does a website cost?
faq.answer: The price is individual and depends on the complexity and scope of the project. We guarantee the best quality for a fair price and the delivery of a reliable product that will serve your business long-term. Contact us for a non-binding quote.

faq.question: How long does it take to create a website?
faq.answer: We deliver a standard corporate website within 2-4 weeks from the delivery of materials.

faq.question: Will I be able to edit the website myself?
faq.answer: Yes, we can provide an administration system (CMS) for every website, where you can easily change texts or photos.

faq.question: Do you also redesign old websites?
faq.answer: Yes, modernizing old websites is our specialty. We will preserve your SEO positions and improve design and performance.

ecommerce.title: Custom E-shop Development
ecommerce.description: Comprehensive solutions for online sales. We create e-shops that sell, are secure, and easy to manage. Scalable solutions for your growth.

meta.title: Custom E-shop Development | E-commerce Solutions - Rise.sk
meta.description: Professional custom e-shop development. Increase your sales with a fast and secure online store. Payment and shipping integration.

features.title: High Conversions
features.description: UX design focused on a simple purchasing process and minimizing abandoned carts.

features.title: Payment Gateways
features.description: Integration of Stripe, GoPay, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay for convenient payments.

features.title: System Integration
features.description: Connection with accounting (Pohoda, SuperFaktúra), warehouse, and couriers.

features.title: Speed and Stability
features.description: Handles customer influx during the season thanks to scalable architecture.

features.title: SEO for Products
features.description: Automatic generation of metadata and structured data for Google Shopping.

features.title: Marketing Tools
features.description: Discount codes, newsletters, upsell and cross-sell functions directly in the system.

tools.title: Technologies and Integrations
tools.subtitle: We use proven platforms and payment systems

process.title: Requirements Analysis
process.description: We define the assortment, target audience, and necessary integrations.

process.title: UX/UI Design
process.description: We design a clear catalog and intuitive cart.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Backend development, frontend, and connection to external services.

process.title: Testing and Training
process.description: We test the purchasing process and train you in administration.

faq.question: What is the price for e-shop development?
faq.answer: Custom e-shops start from €2500. The price depends on the number of integrations and specific functions.

faq.question: Can you connect the e-shop to a warehouse?
faq.answer: Yes, we commonly integrate warehouse systems, ERP, and invoicing software.

faq.question: Is the e-shop optimized for mobile?
faq.answer: Of course. A mobile-first approach is a necessity for us, as most purchases happen via phone.

faq.question: Do you provide technical support?
faq.answer: Yes, we ensure long-term management, updates, and monitoring of the e-shop.

features.title: iOS and Android
features.description: We develop for both platforms simultaneously using React Native or Flutter, which saves costs.

features.title: Native Performance
features.description: Applications are fast, smooth, and utilize phone hardware to the fullest.

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: The application works even without the internet, and data synchronizes after connection.

features.title: Push Notifications
features.description: Reach users directly on their screen and increase engagement.

features.title: Modern UI Design
features.description: Design according to the latest Apple and Google standards for intuitive control.

features.title: Store Publication

items.name: Swift

process.description: We draw screens and application logic.

process.title: UI Design
process.description: We create the final look of the application.

process.title: Development
process.description: Programming the mobile part and backend API.

process.title: Testing and Release
process.description: Beta testing and deployment to stores.

faq.question: How much does app development cost?
faq.answer: The price depends on the complexity and scope of the project. We guarantee the highest quality and delivery of a top-tier product. We will be happy to prepare a precise calculation for you.

faq.question: Do you do both iOS and Android?
faq.answer: Yes, we specialize in multi-platform development, so you get both versions for a better price.

faq.question: How long does development take?
faq.answer: We can make simple mobile apps in 1 month, more complex projects take several months. The timeline highly depends on the app's complexity and the duration of the review and testing process during publishing.

faq.question: What happens after release?
faq.answer: We provide a service contract for updates and bug fixes that may arise with new iOS/Android versions.

customSoftware.title: Custom Software and Systems
customSoftware.description: Digitization of company processes, CRM systems, internal portals, and API integrations. Software that adapts to your company, not the other way around.

meta.title: Custom Software Development | Corporate Systems - Rise.sk

features.title: Automation

features.title: API Integrations

features.title: Scalability
features.description: The system will grow with your company without the need for rewriting.

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Clear dashboards and charts for better management decision-making.

features.title: Data Security
features.description: Enterprise-level security for sensitive company data.

tools.title: Our Tech Stack
tools.subtitle: We build on modern and secure technologies

process.title: In-depth Analysis
process.description: We understand your processes and identify bottlenecks.

process.title: Architecture
process.description: We propose a technical solution and database model.

process.title: Agile Development
process.description: We deliver functional parts gradually so you can use them immediately.

process.title: Deployment and Support
process.description: Implementation into operation and employee training.

faq.question: Why custom software and not a boxed solution?
faq.answer: A boxed solution forces you to adapt to it. Custom software exactly copies and improves your unique processes.

faq.question: What technologies do you use?
faq.answer: We build the backend on Node.js or Python, frontend on React/Next.js. PostgreSQL databases.

faq.question: Who owns the source code?
faq.answer: After handover and payment of the project, property rights pass to you.

faq.question: What about security?
faq.answer: We adhere to strict security standards, data encryption, and GDPR rules.

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.tagline: The future is here. Prepare your company for it.
ai.description: We optimize your business processes using artificial intelligence. We provide training, audits, and implementation of AI tools that save time and money.

meta.title: AI Training and Process Automation | Rise.sk
meta.description: Increase your company's efficiency with AI. We offer employee training, technology audits, and automation implementation. Save costs and speed up processes.

features.title: 1. AI for Beginners
features.subtitle: Education | 2.5 hours | Group: max 6 people
features.description: We start from the basics. We explain what AI is and how it works. You will learn to use **Gemini AI**, write your first prompts, and streamline work in **Google Workspace**.
benefits: Basics of prompting and email signatures

features.title: 2. AI for Advanced
features.subtitle: Education | 3 hours | Group: max 6 people
features.description: We go deep. We learn advanced techniques, image generation, and working with **NotebookLM** for document analysis. We change the way you think about problem-solving.

features.title: 3. AI Practical Workshop
features.subtitle: Practice | 3 hours | Group: max 6 people
features.description: We turn theory into practice. We solve your specific company problems. You choose the area (marketing, HR, sales) and we set up the processes together.
benefits: Solving specific use-cases of your company

features.title: 4. Process Automation
features.subtitle: Implementation
features.description: Once you know how to use AI, it's time to let it work independently. We connect your emails, CRM, and invoicing so things happen automatically.

features.title: 5. Technology Upgrade
features.subtitle: Infrastructure
features.description: To make everything run smoothly, we look at your hardware and software. We recommend modern tools and equipment for maximum productivity.

tools.title: Tools we teach and use
tools.subtitle: We work with the best AI models on the market

items.name: ChatGPT, Claude & Gemini
items.description: Advanced language models and Google Workspace AI

items.name: Copilot
items.description: AI assistance in programming and work

process.title: 1. Initial Audit
process.description: We find out how your company works and where you have the most room for improvement using AI.

process.title: 2. Solution Proposal
process.description: We prepare a training or technical implementation plan tailored exactly to your needs.

process.title: 3. Implementation and Training
process.description: We implement tools and teach your people to work with them. Practically and understandably.

process.title: 4. Support and Development
process.description: We monitor results and help you keep up with the rapid development of AI technologies.

faq.question: Is AI suitable for a small company?
faq.answer: Yes, small companies can benefit the most from AI because it allows them to do 'big things' with a small team.

faq.question: How long does employee training take?
faq.answer: Basic training usually takes half a day to one day. For deeper adoption, we recommend a series of workshops.

faq.question: Will AI replace our employees?
faq.answer: No, our goal is for AI to help your people, rid them of boring routine, and allow them to focus on more creative work.

faq.question: What are the implementation costs?
faq.answer: The price depends on the scope. Training starts from hundreds of euros, complex automations are priced individually according to the savings they bring.

cta.primary: I want to streamline my company

outsourcing.title: IT Outsourcing and Team Leasing
outsourcing.tagline: Top developers ready for your project. Immediately.
outsourcing.description: We provide dedicated development teams and individual experts. Flexibly scale your capacities without the hassle of recruitment and HR agenda.

meta.title: IT Outsourcing and Developer Leasing | Rise.sk
meta.description: Lease verified developers or entire teams. React, Node.js, Python, Mobile. Fast onboarding, seniority, and quality guarantee.

features.title: Immediate Onboarding
features.description: Don't waste months looking for people. Our team can start working on your project within 7 days.

features.title: Verified Seniority
features.description: Our developers have passed a rigorous selection process and have experience from international projects. No juniors learning on your code.

features.title: Capacity Flexibility
features.description: Need to add two people for a month before a deadline? Or build an entire team for a year? We adapt.

features.title: No HR Hassles
features.description: We handle levies, holidays, sick leave, hardware, or education. You only pay for the work done.

features.title: Replaceability
features.description: If a developer drops out, we immediately provide a replacement. Your project won't stop.

features.title: Transparent Communication
features.description: Developers are part of your team. They communicate directly with you, participate in stand-ups, and use your tools.

tools.title: Technologies we deliver
tools.subtitle: We have experts in a wide range of technologies

items.name: Frontend
items.description: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Angular, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

items.name: Backend
items.description: Node.js, Python, Java, .NET, PHP, Go, Spring Boot

items.name: Cloud & DevOps
items.description: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform

items.name: Data & AI
items.description: TensorFlow, PowerBI, Kafka, Snowflake, OpenAI API

items.name: Databases
items.description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Oracle, MSSQL

process.title: 1. Needs Definition
process.description: Tell us who you are looking for (tech stack, seniority) and for how long.

process.title: 2. Candidate Selection
process.description: Within 48 hours, we will send you profiles (CVs) of available developers who meet your criteria.

process.title: 3. Interview
process.description: You can have a technical interview with selected candidates to verify their skills and chemistry.

process.title: 4. Onboarding and Start
process.description: We sign a contract and the developer joins your team. We monitor satisfaction and report regularly.

faq.question: What is the hourly rate?
faq.answer: Rates depend on seniority and technology, usually ranging from €35 to €60 per hour. For long-term cooperation, we offer discounted 'flat' prices.

faq.question: Can I try the developer first?
faq.answer: Yes, we standardly offer a trial period (e.g., 2 weeks) during which you can terminate the cooperation at any time if you are not satisfied.

faq.question: Do developers work remote or onsite?
faq.answer: We mostly work remotely, but within Bratislava and the surrounding area, a hybrid mode or occasional visits to the client are also possible.

faq.question: What about intellectual property?
faq.answer: All code and work created by our developers is the exclusive property of your company. It is contractually guaranteed.

portfolio.title: Successful
portfolio.subtitle: Explore samples of our most successful projects and technology solutions

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.description: Our most significant and successful implementations

descriptions.horilla: Modern open-source HR management system with advanced payroll tool developed in collaboration with HexaTech s.r.o. We have been working for 3 months on a very smart payroll tool built with Python Django framework. We specialize in comprehensive human resource management and automated payroll calculations. Our team, in collaboration, is creating a specialized Slovak payroll module that precisely adheres to Slovak legislative requirements.
descriptions.viacAkoNick: Mobile application for children's helpline developed with cutting-edge technologies - Flutter, Dart, PHP backend with native iOS and Android support. We created a secure communication platform where children and young people can seek help in difficult life situations. The application includes advanced security features, message encryption, and compliance with European child protection standards.
descriptions.lumturi: Sophisticated online auction platform built on WordPress framework with extended PHP backend. The project is currently in development in collaboration with Try Art company. We are working on expanding the functionality of the existing platform, adding advanced features like real-time bidding, automatic notifications, secure payments, and detailed transaction history. Our collaboration brings technical improvements and modernization of the user interface.
descriptions.pixelCorporation: Advanced mobile application for iOS and Android in collaboration with Pixel Corporation s.r.o. We have been working with them for 3 months on a running app developed in Expo and React Native with TypeScript architecture. We did not create it from scratch, but improved the existing application and performed major dependency updates. The application includes GPS tracking, performance analysis, social features, and advanced statistics for the running community.
descriptions.trulink: Comprehensive web platform with advanced functionality that we have been developing for 2 months using Next.js framework. The project includes responsive design, real-time features, and modern technologies. The application is designed with emphasis on user experience, security, and quality results. The platform contains advanced algorithms, real-time communication, and modern security features with an excellent satisfaction rating of 10/10.
descriptions.riseWeb: Full-featured corporate website for IT company completely created by our team in 1 month. We developed the entire design, wrote all texts, and programmed the complete code in Next.js framework with modern design and advanced functionality. Features SEO optimization, fast loading, responsive design, and advanced analytics tools. The project is 100% ours - from concept to implementation.
descriptions.doucma: For six years, we taught computer science on this educational platform and utilized various IT technologies to improve the educational process. Our activities brought many satisfied students and clients who expanded their knowledge in computer science. We applied modern pedagogical approaches combined with technological solutions for more effective education.
descriptions.rozvojDopravy: Sophisticated web application for urban transportation optimization developed in Vue.js and Node.js with advanced visualization tools. The system analyzes traffic flows, generates intelligent charts and reports, and helps the city of Trnava optimize transportation infrastructure. Features real-time monitoring, predictive algorithms, and interactive dashboard for urban planners.
descriptions.twoRing: Long-term enterprise partnership for developing complex business applications in C#, SQL databases, and Vue.js frontend. We create scalable solutions for large corporations with emphasis on security, performance, and user-friendliness. Our collaboration includes continuous development, maintenance, and functionality expansion of enterprise systems for international markets.

reviews.name: Michael J.
reviews.content: RISE.SK is a reliable developer. I assigned tasks directly from the Kanban board and the team efficiently completed them. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a responsible partner.

reviews.name: Matej Š.
reviews.content: Thank you for quickly scheduling a consultation. RISE.SK helped me develop a website analysis tool – finally the project moved forward. 5/5!

reviews.name: Tomáš V.
reviews.content: SQL database training with RISE.SK was engaging and practical. They clearly explained advanced techniques, answered all questions and solved complex problems step by step. Now I feel much more confident working with SQL.

reviews.name: Timotej L.
reviews.content: I started with Python from scratch. RISE.SK quickly clarified the problem in a friendly atmosphere, the code suddenly worked and progress was immediate. I recommend to anyone who wants to master Python quickly and effectively.

reviews.name: Pavel K.
reviews.content: RISE.SK helped me a lot with a C project. Professional approach, clear explanation, perfect result. I recommend 5/5 ★.

reviews.name: René
reviews.content: I needed help with Python at work. RISE.SK set up a clear plan and the lessons were understandable and practical. I can only recommend the collaboration.

reviews.name: Jana G.
reviews.content: RISE.SK guided my son into programming in English. The lessons were always prepared, focused on his goals, and progress was visible with every session. I also appreciate the team's professional English.

reviews.name: Zuzana P.
reviews.content: I have programming tutoring with RISE.SK. Communication is seamless, they adapt to my schedule, explain everything, and make sure I try the solutions myself. Great support for developing practical skills.

reviews.name: Roman S.
reviews.content: I'm in my first year of university and RISE.SK tutors me in programming. They explain everything perfectly, are reliable and really know what they're doing.

reviews.name: Daniel K.
reviews.content: Professionalism at every step – RISE.SK managed to clearly explain every concept and answer all questions. Great tutoring, I recommend it.

items.question: What services do you provide?
items.answer: We specialize in custom web and mobile app development, e-commerce solutions, and enterprise systems. From initial analysis to deployment and long-term support.

items.question: How much does a project cost?
items.answer: Every project is unique. We offer fair prices that reflect high quality and added value. You get a top-tier solution for a reasonable investment that pays off.

items.question: How long does delivery take?
items.answer: Smaller projects are delivered within weeks, complex systems in months. We always ensure deadlines are met without compromising on quality.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We build on modern and proven technologies like Next.js, React, React Native, Python, and cloud services. This guarantees speed, security, and easy scalability for the future.

items.question: Do you provide support after completion?
items.answer: Absolutely. We seek long-term partnerships. After launching the project, we offer service support, updates, and further development according to your needs.

items.question: What are the payment terms?
items.answer: We set payment terms fairly and flexibly, usually tied to the delivery of specific project milestones.

items.question: Can you integrate new software with our existing systems?
items.answer: Yes, integration with internal systems, CRMs, or third-party APIs is our standard practice. We ensure smooth data flow.

items.question: Is security a priority?
items.answer: We take security seriously. We adhere to strict data protection standards and implement modern security features in every project.
